General.Name: Taiwan Benefit Co
General.Description: Taiwan Benefit Company engages in the equipment manufacturing, production system engineering, and agency businesses in Taiwan, Europe, the United States, and Japan. The company offers a range of food and beverage processing facilities, and packaging machineries comprising rinser/filler/capper monobloc, tunnel cooler/warmer, wrapping around packer, palletizers/depalletizers, conveyor introduction, bag cutting system, labelling machine, sleeve labelling machine, tea extraction, CIP system, and pasteurize system. It also provides a range of technical services, such as engineering design, installation, equipment supply, and turnkey projects services. In addition, the company trades in chemical process equipment; plants and raw materials; and solid and liquid food processing with packaging equipment and raw materials; and provides test running of production machinery system, as well as after-sales technical service. Taiwan Benefit Company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
